title: The Newstead Swimming Pool
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community centers
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Country life - Psychological aspects
abstract: One of the many community hubs of Newstead, the local swimming pool. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Mount Alexander'.
description: The Newstead Pool is an important hub of this Victorian town and a community hang-out that gets very lively in the summer.  It is run by more than 50 volunteers and is a place for the community to gather and socialise, and has also been known for a sneaky skinny dip.
